page.title: 20COLWYN SAILING ENTERPRISE
page.content:
This summer has seen the start of a new sailing enterprise in Colwyn Bay. It is called Coast Busters, is open seven days a week and offers dingy sailing, wind surfing, wet biking and water skiing. A week of lessons costs Â£55 and leads to a white (elementary) certificate. Anyone who can swim 50 yards and who is aged between 10 and 65 may have a go.
{* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * {* * * * * * * * * * * * * }
Text pages 1-11 inclusive have been prepared by {YSGOL PENDORLAN,COLWYN {BAY.} Text pages 12-20 inclusive have been prepared by {RYDAL PREPARATORY SCHOOL.
